lead_paragraph: Hurdler Aries Merritt captured a bronze medal at worlds last August with his kidneys operating at barely 10 percent. No wonder he's beaming at the prospect of competing at full health again.

headline.print_headline: Aries Merritt Tries to Make Olympic Team With New Kidney
headline.main: Aries Merritt Tries to Make Olympic Team With New Kidney

snippet: Hurdler Aries Merritt captured a bronze medal at worlds last August with his kidneys operating at barely 10 percent. No wonder he's beaming at the prospect of competing at full health again....
